content: The report should include the following sections and follow the provided instructions to ensure proper structure and clarity.

sections.name: Word Limit
sections.description: Maximum of 3000 words (excluding references). Be concise and to the point while covering all necessary details.

sections.name: Abstract
sections.description: A brief overview of the project (200 words). Summarize the problem, methodology, results, and conclusions.

sections.name: Introduction
sections.description: Provide an overview of the problem and solution. This section should briefly explain the motivation behind the project and the approach you are taking.

sections.name: Background
sections.description: Provide general information about the topic. This section should include any necessary background information to understand the context of the problem being solved.

sections.name: Literature Review
sections.description: Review the existing literature relevant to the problem and the solution. Discuss prior research, key findings, and how they relate to your work.

sections.name: Methodology
sections.description: Describe the methodology used to solve the problem. Include details about the deep learning model used, the dataset, pre-processing and augmentation techniques, and the training and evaluation processes.

sections.name: Results and Discussion
sections.description: Present the results of the evaluation of your solution. Include performance metrics used and discuss the results, highlighting significant findings.

sections.name: Conclusion
sections.description: Summarize the main findings of your work and provide recommendations for future work. Discuss any potential improvements or directions for further research.

sections.name: References
sections.description: List all the sources cited in the report. Ensure all references follow a recognized citation style, such as the IEEE citation style.

instructions_for_writing.clarity_and_conciseness: The report should be written in a clear and concise manner, with proper grammar and spelling. Avoid unnecessary jargon and keep explanations straightforward.
instructions_for_writing.structure: The report should have a clear and well-organized structure, with concise headings and subheadings. Each section should flow logically into the next.
instructions_for_writing.citations: Ensure proper citations for all sources used, following a recognized citation style, such as the IEEE citation style. Include all relevant sources in the References section.
instructions_for_writing.technical_style: Write the report in a technical and scientific style, with appropriate use of technical terminology. Avoid informal language and focus on precise, clear descriptions.
instructions_for_writing.figures_and_tables: Include relevant figures and tables to illustrate the results of your work. Ensure that all figures and tables are clearly labeled and referenced in the text.

report_template.template: Students should use the IEEE Conference Paper Template. You can download the template here: [IEEE Conference Paper Template Link].
